channel.title: Dwarf Remains Equip Null after compile / restart?
channel.description:
EDIT: THIS IS WHENEVER WE LOG OUT, GET KICKED, DC, COMPILE, RESTART, ANYTHING THAT MAKES AN ACCOUNT GO OFFLINE, THIS WILL HAPPEN. PLEASE HELP :( JUST WASTED ABOUT 18 HOURS OF CODING IN 1 DAY FOR THIS :( and 2 wks work
Whenever i Compile / restart my server, All accounts get stat wiped, and bank inv and equips
and it looks like this (Imagine another dwarf on the ags)
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2mc92dw.png[/img]
I need some help with this. Today i have completely turned around my server, changed home shops added skillign area, added thieving, added donator area, too much to talk about.
If any1 can help me with this, Add my msn or post.
Amreetitssteve@hotmail.com

item.title: Dwarf Remains Equip Null after compile / restart?
item.dc:creator: @db0wzz db0wzz
item.description:
@db0wzz wrote:

no, we were coding a hell lot yesterday and i believe it was after we changed a teleport this started happening, im not 100% sure

Read full topic
